1. Course overview and motivation¶

1.1. Introduction¶

This first part of the course aims to give the motivations for studying programming; to show why programming is an important skill to learn. It also gives some background and wider/general information to set the context for the rest of the course.

1.2. Where you’ll use this knowledge¶

Here essential motivation. Some of this is background knowledge to set the scene, which you may or may not use directly.

The information on “Background: Inside a computer” is core to this course. In particular, if you’ve not used the command line before it’s introduced here for the first time. You’ll use the command line a lot in this course, and very likely in any other programming tasks that you carry out for your degree or at work.
